0.text: Innate - Icebreaker: Enemies  stunned by Sejuani are marked Frozen for the disable's duration. Sejuani's next basic attack or ability against a Frozen enemy will consume the mark to deal bonus magic damage equal to 10% of their maximum health, capped at 300 against epic monsters.
0.html: Innate - Icebreaker: Enemies stunned by Sejuani are marked Frozen for the disable's duration. Sejuani's next basic attack or ability against a Frozen enemy will consume the mark to deal bonus magic damage equal to 10% of their maximum health, capped at 300 against epic monsters.
markedPassages: stunned

1.text: Innate - Frost Armor: Sejuani gains Frost Armor, which lingers for 3 seconds after taking damage from enemy  champions or  monsters. She restores it after 12 − 6 (based on level) seconds without taking damage from them.
1.html: Innate - Frost Armor: Sejuani gains Frost Armor, which lingers for 3 seconds after taking damage from enemy champions or monsters. She restores it after 12 − 6 (based on level) seconds without taking damage from them.
markedPassages: champions
monsters

1.text: Sejuani can cast any of her abilities during the dash. Arctic Assault will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
1.html: Sejuani can cast any of her abilities during the dash. Arctic Assault will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Sejuani can cast any of her abilities during the dash. Arctic Assault will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and  knocks back  minions and  monsters hit.
0.html: Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and knocks back minions and monsters hit.
markedPassages: knocks back
minions
monsters

1.text: After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
1.html: After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

2.text: Sejuani can move during Winter's Wrath's cast time.
2.html: Sejuani can move during Winter's Wrath's cast time.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Sejuani can move during Winter's Wrath's cast time.

0.text: Passive:  Winter's Wrath and both Sejuani's and nearby allied  melee champions' attacks  on-hit apply stacks of Frost to enemy  champions, medium or large  monsters, and large  minions for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 4 times, though not applying if the target is  Frozen. Enemies hit by Permafrost or  Glacial Prison's bola have all of their Frost stacks consumed. Enemy champions cannot be affected by Frost for 10 seconds after having it consumed. Sejuani can cast Permafrost against an enemy with 4 stacks.
0.html:
Passive: Winter's Wrath and both Sejuani's and nearby allied melee champions' attacks on-hit apply stacks of Frost to enemy champions, medium or large monsters, and large minions for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 4 times, though not applying if the target is Frozen. Enemies hit by Permafrost or Glacial Prison's bola have all of their Frost stacks consumed. Enemy champions cannot be affected by Frost for 10 seconds after having it consumed.

Sejuani can cast Permafrost against an enemy with 4 stacks.

1.text: Active: Sejuani hurls a trap at the  visible enemy with 4 stacks of Frost closest to the cursor, which deals magic damage,  knocks them down, and  stuns them for 1 second.
1.html: Active: Sejuani hurls a trap at the visible enemy with 4 stacks of Frost closest to the cursor, which deals magic damage, knocks them down, and stuns them for 1 second.
markedPassages: visible
knocks them down
stuns

2.text: Permafrost  resets Sejuani's basic attack timer.
2.html: Permafrost resets Sejuani's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Permafrost  resets Sejuani's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage and  stunning them for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 1 second.
markedPassages: stunning

1.text: If the bola travels over 400 units, it becomes empowered to detonate upon reaching maximum range or hitting an enemy champion, dealing increased damage and  stunning for 1.5 seconds instead. For the same duration, a frost storm is created that  slows enemies within by 30% and grants  sight of the area in a smaller radius.
1.html: If the bola travels over 400 units, it becomes empowered to detonate upon reaching maximum range or hitting an enemy champion, dealing increased damage and stunning for 1.5 seconds instead. For the same duration, a frost storm is created that slows enemies within by 30% and grants sight of the area in a smaller radius.
markedPassages: stunning
slows
sight

2.text: Afterwards, the storm shatters to deal magic damage to enemies hit and  slow them by 80% for 1 second, as well as  revealing them and granting  sight of the area for 0.5 seconds.
2.html: Afterwards, the storm shatters to deal magic damage to enemies hit and slow them by 80% for 1 second, as well as revealing them and granting sight of the area for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slow
revealing
sight

3.text: The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.
3.html: The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.

abilities.concerningText: Active:  Bristle  dashes to the target location until he collides with an enemy  champion, dealing magic damage to enemies he passes through and  knocking them up for 0.5 seconds.
Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and  knocks back  minions and  monsters hit.
After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
Active: Sejuani hurls a trap at the  visible enemy with 4 stacks of Frost closest to the cursor, which deals magic damage,  knocks them down, and  stuns them for 1 second.
Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage and  stunning them for 1 second.

If the bola travels over 400 units, it becomes empowered to detonate upon reaching maximum range or hitting an enemy champion, dealing increased damage and  stunning for 1.5 seconds instead. For the same duration, a frost storm is created that  slows enemies within by 30% and grants  sight of the area in a smaller radius.
Afterwards, the storm shatters to deal magic damage to enemies hit and  slow them by 80% for 1 second, as well as  revealing them and granting  sight of the area for 0.5 seconds.

Stats

+20 ability haste
+800 health
+200% base health regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Colossal Consumption: While within 700 units of an enemy champion, generate a stack on them each second, stacking up to 3 times. Your next basic attack against a target with 3 stacks is empowered to consume them all to deal 125 (+ 6% maximum health) bonus physical damage on-hit and grant you permanent bonus health equal to「 10% of that amount 」「 12.5 (+ 0.6% maximum health) 」 (30 (per target) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 1% bonus health and 6% increased size.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – COLOSSAL CONSUMPTION: While within 700 units of an enemy champion, generate a stack on them each second, stacking up to 3 times. Your next basic attack against a target with 3 stacks is empowered to consume them all to deal 125 (+ 6% maximum health) bonus physical damage on-hit and grant you permanent bonus health equal to「 10% of that amount 」 (30 (per target) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  700

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+500 health
+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.

Passive

Unique – Rock Solid: Every first incoming instance of post-mitigation basic damage per cast instance is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.
Unique – Winter's Caress: Cripples the attack speed of enemies within 700 units by 20%.

Passive

Unique – Fortify: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FORTIFY: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1250

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+350 health
+70 magic resistance
+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.

Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
